Title: XLite Eval - Evaluate string expressions
Description:
XLite Eval evaluates a given string expression and provides the value of the expression as the final result. It supports arithmetic operations, string operations, boolean operations and functions on any of these data types. 

The functions supported by XLite Eval are similar to MS Excel functions.

The application is written in C# and is supported for all .NET applications. The library is compatible with all .NET applications (including Silverlight). Additional support for Silverlight includes an expression textbox.
HomeWiki:
Expression Evaluator

This evaluates a string expression and generates the result. This can be compared to a javascript/PHP eval() function. But this does not evaluate a C# code block but it supports its own set of functions and these functions can be very easily extended. The design is very light and easily extendable.

This also contains a set of predefined functions in Excel style.

This also includes an intelligent TextBox.

Demo
To view a live demo, visit the following link http://www.shishirrao.com/stuff/SR.ExpressionEvaluator

Default set of functions
IF()
AND()
OR()
NOT()
SUM()
NOW()
DATEDIF()
ISBLANK()

Sample expressions

4*8

{(1+2)*3}

(SUM(100000,(IS_PREM/0.5),IS_PREM)+1)*PI

IF(3*(IS_PREM-500),TRUE,FASE)

IF(3*(IS_PREM-500),TRUE,FASE)

IF(DATEDIF(NOW(),IS_DOB,"y")>15,IS_NAME,"Unknown")

ISBLANK("","","")

DATEDIF(NOW(),IS_DOB,"y")

(DATEDIF(NOW(),IS_DOB,"ym")*0.1+(1/2)^PI)*IS_PREM
